name: Amulet of Health
description: Your Constitution score is 19 while you wear this amulet. It has no effect on you if your Constitution score is already 19 or higher.

name: Shield
description: AC: 2. A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

name: Studded Leather Armor
description: AC: 12 + Dex modifier. Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.
